name: Slack Send
author: Fuse Official
description: Post messages to Slack channels or users via Webhook or OAuth.

inputs.name: webhook_url
inputs.label: Credential or Webhook
inputs.description: Select a Slack credential or enter a Webhook URL

inputs.name: channel
inputs.label: Channel
inputs.description: Select the channel to post to (required for OAuth)

inputs.name: text
inputs.label: Message Text
inputs.description: The message content (supports Jinja2 templates like {{input.value}})

outputs.name: success
outputs.label: Success
outputs.description: Whether the message was posted successfully
